blogs.title: 1Q84
blogs.body: 1Q84 is a novel written by Japanese writer Haruki Murakami, first published in three volumes in Japan in 2009–10.
blogs.author: Haruki Murakami

blogs.title: Oscar and the Lady in Pink!
blogs.body: Oscar and the Lady in Pink is a novel written by Éric-Emmanuel Schmitt, the third part of the series «Cycle de l'invisible», published in 2002.
blogs.author: Éric-Emmanuel Schmitt
